General.Name: Ta Win Holdings Bhd
General.Description: Ta Win Holdings Berhad, an investment holding company, manufactures and trades in copper wires, rods, and cables in Malaysia, China, India, Korea, Singapore, and internationally. It offers automotive, oil and gas, military and aerospace, elevator/lift, fire and flame retardant, housing and LV power, solar PV and power, instrument, and welding and battery cables. The company's magnet wires are used in a range of applications, including magnetic coils inside alternators, ballasts, generators, motors, and transformers, as well as degaussing coil inside television, etc.; and welding wires for tin can manufacturing. In addition, the company is involved in the provision of project management, consultancy, and research and development, production, marketing, and distribution of products in applications and relation of electron beam irradiation technology. Further, the company designs, develops, finances, builds, operates, sells, and markets industrial park called "Terengganu Ecocycle Park'; and provision of property management, property facilities, renting and operating, construction, non-ferrous metals waste management services, and recycling. The company was formerly known as Medan Perdana Berhad and changed its name to Ta Win Holdings Berhad in June 1998. Ta Win Holdings Berhad was incorporated in 1994 and is headquartered in Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia.
